                "val matchResult = \n    Regex(\"c|d\").find(\"efg\")           // matchResult: null\nval a = matchResult?.value             // a: null\nval b = matchResult?.value.orEmpty()   // b: \"\"\na?.toUpperCase()                       // Still needs question mark. => null    \nb.toUpperCase()                        // Accesses the function directly. => \"\""

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["The essential thing to understand with all the "],
              ["Regex", [["c"]]],
              [" functions is that the result is based on matching the regex "],
              ["pattern", [["c"]]],
              [" and the "],
              ["input", [["c"]]],
              [
                " string. Some of the functions requires a full match, while the rest requires only a partial match. The "
              ],
              ["containsMatchIn(..)", [["c"]]],
              [
                " function used in the example requires a partial match and is explained later in this post."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

              ["The "],
              ["input", [["c"]]],
              [" string will be matched against the "],
              ["pattern", [["c"]]],
              [" in the "],
              ["Regex", [["c"]]],
              [" object. It returns a "],
              ["Matchresult?", [["c"]]],
              [" object with the first matched text after the "],
              ["startIndex", [["c"]]],
              [", or "],
              ["null", [["c"]]],
              [" if the pattern didn’t match the "],

              [" string. The result string is retrieved from the "],

              [" object’s "],
              ["value", [["c"]]],
              [" property. The "],
              ["startIndex", [["c"]]],

        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "content": [
            "6b36fe3d-e9d1-4362-a788-7f71da7eb9ee",
            "379f5fb7-ec33-4a1f-ae4c-816c97d567a0"
          ],
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

            "page_full_width": true,
